name: CoffeeTimer
0:
”Alexa, ask Coffee Timer to brew 25 grams of coffee with pourover”
”Alexa, ask Coffee Timer to brew 18 grams of coffee by aeropress”
”Alexa, ask Coffee Timer to brew 25 grams of coffee via pour over”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: coffee timer
des:
Coffee Timer is the most convenient way to start timing your manual coffee brewing at home. Coffee Timer replaces the need for stopwatches or clock watching by giving you accurate audio prompts for when to start pouring, when to stop, and how much water to pour.

Coffee Timer currently supports brewing via pourover and aeropress.

Telling Alexa to stop while in the brewing process will give you your total brew time.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
